description.name: Insulated shoes OB E FO SRC – r. 44
description.long_desc:
```html

Geko insulated work boots are the ideal solution for professionals who value maximum comfort, safety, and durability in any working conditions. Made from high-quality cowhide leather, they guarantee not only durability but also exceptional comfort, which is crucial during long-term use. Thanks to the insulated lining, the boots perform excellently in low temperatures, protecting the feet from the cold.



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Color: Black

  • Material: Cowhide leather with an insulating lining

  • Sole: Polyurethane; anti-slip; resistant to oils, gasoline

  • Shock-absorbing heel

  • Standards compliance: PN-EN ISO 20347:2012

  • Shoe features: SRC, E, FO


Exceptional comfort and warmth are the key features of these boots. The soft, insulating lining provides thermal comfort, and the proper fit along with the leather material ensures comfort during long hours of work.


Product characteristics:




  • SRC – Anti-slip sole:
    Safety on every surface! Geko boots are equipped with a certified SRC anti-slip sole, ensuring excellent grip on both wet and dry surfaces. Perfect for work in challenging, slippery conditions.




  • E – Shock absorption system:
    For your comfort and health, the boots have an advanced shock absorption system in the heel area. This reduces the strain on joints and the spine, which is crucial when working on hard surfaces and during intense activity.




  • FO – Resistance to oils, gasoline, and organic solvents:
    The sole of Geko boots is resistant to oils, gasoline, and organic solvents, making them ideal for work in workshops, construction sites, and any place where contact with chemicals is common.
```

description.name: Insulated safety shoes S3 SRC – r. 39
description.long_desc:
```html

Are you looking for reliable work boots that provide not only safety but also comfort and warmth while working? The insulated Geko safety boots are the perfect solution for anyone who values top quality, protection, and comfort.



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Color: Black

  • Material: Cowhide leather with insulating lining

  • Sole: Polyurethane; anti-slip; resistant to oils, gasoline, and other solvents

  • Shock-absorbing heel

  • Steel toe cap for protection

  • Safety class: S3

  • Compliance with standards: CE EN ISO 20345:2011

  • Shoe features: SRC, E, FO

  • Puncture resistance

  • Steel toe caps resistant to 200J impact and 15 kN compression

  • Steel midsole resistant to punctures up to 1100 Newtons


An ideal solution for people working in harsh conditions who need both reliable protection and comfort. By choosing these boots, you can be sure that your feet are safe, and you can focus on your work without worrying about health and comfort.


Product characteristics:



  • S3 safety class: These boots meet all the requirements of the S3 class, ensuring the highest level of protection in tough working conditions. Perfect for use on construction sites, warehouses, workshops, and anywhere solid safety footwear is required.

  • Steel toe cap: Provides effective protection for your toes from impacts and crushing, minimizing the risk of injury. The toe cap meets EN ISO standards, confirming its high durability.

  • SRC – Anti-slip sole: The sole provides excellent traction on various surfaces, including slippery ones, significantly enhancing safety, especially in wet or oily conditions.

  • E – Shock absorption system: The energy absorption in the heel area protects joints and the spine from excessive strain while walking, which is particularly important during long hours of work.

  • FO – Resistance to oils, gasoline, and organic solvents: The sole is resistant to harmful chemicals, making these boots an ideal choice for industrial environments, workshops, or laboratories.

  • Puncture resistance: The reinforced sole protects the foot from punctures by sharp objects, which is crucial when working on construction sites or in hazardous waste areas.

  • Material: Made from high-quality cowhide leather, which ensures durability and resistance to damage. Additionally, the insulating lining guarantees thermal comfort, making the boots suitable even for colder conditions.

  • Exceptional comfort: Thanks to the ergonomic design and high-quality materials, the boots fit the foot perfectly, providing comfort even during long hours of work. The insulating lining ensures that your feet stay warm, even in low temperatures.

  • Steel toe cap with a strength of 200J for extra toe protection



























EU Size3940414243444546
Insole length (cm)25.726.42727.728.42929.730.4

```

category_idosell.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Fuel Handling and Distribution\Accessories, Equipment

description.name: Drill powered pump with 3m hose
description.long_desc:
Drill-Operated Pump for Fuel Transfer is a practical and versatile tool that, when combined with a standard drill or screwdriver, enables quick and convenient fluid transfer. With its functionality, compact design, and efficiency, this pump is widely applicable for both household and workshop use.


Key Product Features:



  • High Performance: Maximum flow rate of up to 2.4 m3/h, allowing for efficient and fast fluid transfer.

  • Maximum Lifting Height: Up to 3 meters, enabling easy pumping even under challenging conditions.

  • Maximum Allowable Speed: 3400 RPM, ensuring optimal operation and durability.

  • Standard Quick Connectors: Equipped with garden hose quick connectors for easy assembly and compatibility.

  • Complete Set: Includes a 3-meter flexible hose, ready for immediate use.


User Benefits:



  • Compact Size: Facilitates easy storage and transport.

  • Simple Operation: Just connect the pump to a drill or screwdriver to start working.

  • Durable Construction: Designed for reliability and long service life.

  • Universal Compatibility: Broad compatibility with various drills ensures versatile use.


Example Applications:



  1. Tank Draining: Removing fuel, water, oil, or other non-corrosive liquids from barrels, tanks, or reservoirs.

  2. Filling Pools and Ponds: Quickly pumping water into smaller basins.

  3. Household Use: Transferring water during emergencies or repairs.

  4. Automotive Workshops: A handy tool for quickly draining fuel or other liquids.

  5. Gardening: Assists in watering plants or filling water storage tanks.

description.name: Magnifying glasses with LED light
description.long_desc:
ake your work to the next level of precision with functional magnifying glasses. Equipped with LED lighting and a set of five interchangeable lenses with varying magnification levels, these glasses are indispensable in the workshop, at home, or for any hobby requiring meticulous attention to detail.


Product Features:



  • LED Lighting: Two LED lights provide excellent illumination of the workspace, even in low-light conditions. The adjustable angle allows you to direct the light where it's needed most.

  • 5 Interchangeable Lenses: The set includes lenses with magnification levels of x1.0, x1.5, x2.0, x2.5, and x3.5, allowing you to customize the tool for any task.

  • Lens Case: A special protective box ensures safe storage and easy organization of lenses.

  • Adjustable Angles: Both the LED lights and lenses are adjustable, ensuring maximum comfort and optimal positioning for precise work.

  • Lightweight Design: The ergonomic construction and comfortable strap enable extended use without causing fatigue.


Applications:



  • Jewelry and precision work.

  • Repairing electronics and small mechanisms.

  • Reading fine print and analyzing details.

  • Model-making and other hobby projects requiring precision.


Product Benefits:



  • Versatility: A single product with multiple uses thanks to interchangeable lenses and adjustable lighting.

  • Durability and Comfort: Sturdy materials ensure long-lasting performance, while the lightweight design enhances user comfort.

  • Ease of Use: Intuitive switches and a simple lens-mounting system make the product exceptionally user-friendly.

  • 5 Interchangeable Lenses: The set includes lenses with magnification levels of x1.0, x1.5, x2.0, x2.5, and x3.5, allowing you to customize the tool for any task.

  • Lens Case: A special protective box ensures safe storage and easy organization of lenses.

  • Adjustable Angles: Both the LED lights and lenses are adjustable, ensuring maximum comfort and optimal positioning for precise work.

  • Lightweight Design: The ergonomic construction and comfortable strap enable extended use without causing fatigue.


Applications:



  • Jewelry and precision work.

  • Repairing electronics and small mechanisms.

  • Reading fine print and analyzing details.

  • Model-making and other hobby projects requiring precision.


Product Benefits:



  • Versatility: A single product with multiple uses thanks to interchangeable lenses and adjustable lighting.

  • Durability and Comfort: Sturdy materials ensure long-lasting performance, while the lightweight design enhances user comfort.

  • Ease of Use: Intuitive switches and a simple lens-mounting system make the product exceptionally user-friendly.

description.name: 2pcs clamps set for 6/12V batteries
description.long_desc:
Simplify your battery management with innovative clamp terminals designed for quick and safe installation. The set includes two clamps: a red one for the positive terminal (+) and a black one for the negative terminal (-). Perfect for 6V and 12V batteries.


Product Features:



  • Comprehensive Set: Includes two clamps in black and red, allowing precise and intuitive battery connection.

  • Premium Materials: Made from high-quality brass, known for excellent electrical conductivity and corrosion resistance.

  • Quick-Release Mechanism: Equipped with levers for fast and tool-free battery connection and disconnection.

  • Additional Accessories: Comes with protective felt pads (red and green) to minimize the risk of terminal corrosion.

  • Versatility: Compatible with a wide range of vehicles, from cars to agricultural machinery and boats.


Product Benefits:



  • Easy Installation and Removal: Ergonomic levers and precision components ensure quick and effortless setup.

  • Enhanced Safety: Color-coded markings eliminate the risk of incorrect terminal connection.

  • High Durability: Robust construction and attention to detail provide long-lasting, reliable performance under all conditions.

description.name: LCD thermometer with probe
description.long_desc:
Discover the digital thermometer with a probe, a reliable tool for precise temperature measurement. With its compact design and waterproof probe, it's perfect for home, workshop, or professional applications.


Product Features:



  • Accurate Measurements: The digital LCD display ensures fast and clear temperature readings.

  • Waterproof Probe: Equipped with a 1-meter cable, the probe allows for measurements in various environments, including liquids.

  • Wide Temperature Range: Suitable for a variety of applications, measuring from -50°C to +110°C.

  • Compact Design: The small size makes it easy to place the thermometer anywhere you need it.

  • Battery-Powered: Operates on standard batteries for convenient, cord-free use.


Applications:



  • Monitoring temperatures in aquariums, terrariums, and refrigerators.

  • Measuring liquid temperatures in industrial and domestic processes.

  • Versatile use in kitchens and workshops.

description.name: 2pcs aluminium clamps set
description.long_desc:
Ensure a seamless battery connection in your vehicle with high-quality clamp terminals. This reliable set includes two clamps: a red one for the positive terminal (+) and a black one for the negative terminal (-). An ideal choice for both 6V and 12V batteries.


Product Features:



  • Complete Solution: The set includes two clamps in different colors – red and black – for quick and intuitive installation.

  • Durability and Longevity: Made of aluminum, offering high corrosion resistance and excellent electrical conductivity.

  • Versatility: Compatible with most standard 6V/12V batteries, making it a versatile choice for various vehicles such as cars, motorcycles, or boats.

  • Easy Installation: Equipped with wing nuts for quick and hassle-free installation without the need for additional tools.

  • Safety: Color-coded markings (red for positive and black for negative) minimize the risk of incorrect terminal connection.

description.name: Desoldering pump 190mm
Wallpaper pressure roller 15 cm
description.long_desc:
Wałek do tapet to narzędzie o szerokości 150 mm, zaprojektowane specjalnie do wygodnego i precyzyjnego dociskania tapet do ściany.

Rączka wałka jest wykonana z polipropylenu (PP), co zapewnia wygodny i pewny chwyt podczas pracy, minimalizując ryzyko wyślizgnięcia się narzędzia z dłoni.

Rolka wałka jest pokryta miękką pianką, co czyni ją idealnym narzędziem do delikatnego dociskania tapet, bez ryzyka ich uszkodzenia. Całkowita grubość wałka wynosi 44 mm, z czego 35 mm stanowi rdzeń, a pozostałe 9 mm to grubość miękkiej pianki, co zapewnia optymalną amortyzację i równomierne dociskanie tapet.

Wałek posiada otwór o średnicy 8 mm, który umożliwia łatwe zawieszenie narzędzia na haczyku, co ułatwia jego przechowywanie.
